Interface ReferenceDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseDAO<Reference>, DeletableDAO<Reference>, InsertableDAO<Reference>, UpdatableDAO<Reference>

    public interface ReferenceDAO
extends BaseDAO<Reference>, InsertableDAO<Reference>, UpdatableDAO<Reference>, DeletableDAO<Reference>
    Data access object interface for contact

    rafael

      • countReferencesByLevel

        java.util.Map<Reference.Level,java.lang.Integer> countReferencesByLevel(Reference.Nature nature,
                                                                      Period period,
                                                                      Member member,
                                                                      boolean received)
        Count the number of references of a member by level (Reference.Level)
        Parameters:
        member - the member
        received - true to count received references, false to count given references

      • search

        java.util.List<? extends Reference> search(ReferenceQuery params)
                                           throws DaoException
        Searches for references, ordering results by the reference date. If no Reference can be found, returns an empty List. If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation, wrapped it in a DaoException.
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • searchPaymentsAwaitingFeedback

        Searches for payments that should have but still have no feedback
